title: A Liberal London? (with Mayoral Candidate Luisa Porritt)
itunes:title: A Liberal London? (with Mayoral Candidate Luisa Porritt)
description:
In the first of our interviews with the candidates for Mayor of London 2021, Luisa Porritt for the Liberal Democrats tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Roger Hearing there needs to be changes on housing, transport and policing. Porritt also says the damage to communities brought about by the pandemic needs to be addressed.

Plus Sian Elliott, women's equality policy officer at the Trades Union Congress joins to discuss the letter sent by TUC, Amnesty International, Save the Children and others to the Equality and Human Rights Commission calling for an investigation into whether the government has broken equality law during the pandemic. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
